app_summary: The application implements a hotel reservation service, built with Go and gRPC. The initial project is extended in several ways, including adding back-end in-memory and persistent databases, adding a recommender system for obtaining hotel recommendations, and adding the functionality to place a hotel reservation.
RCA_gt: A fixed 10-second network delay has been injected into the user service. Unlike a crash or packet loss, requests are successfully processing but are taking significantly longer than acceptable thresholds. Jaeger traces will show spans for the user service consistently lasting approximately 10 seconds, causing the application to feel unresponsive without failing outright.
